BadgeDetail.Name: Mentor
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has provided mentoring and support for someone else. This could be in the form of training, tuition or professional advice.

Task.Title: Mentor
Task.Body: Upload an account describing how you have mentored someone. This should include what skills or experience you shared, who you mentored and for how long.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload an account describing how you have mentored someone. This should include what skills or experience you shared, who you mentored and for how long.
